caption.title: (related to Fig 4). SARS‐CoV‐2 isolate USA‐ WA1/2020 activates ACAT
caption.p: Calu‐3 cells were infected with SARS‐CoV‐2 USA‐WA1/2020 at MOI = 2 for 24 h at 37°C or treated with 5 μM 25HC for 24 h. Cells were then stained with 1X LipidSpot 488 for 30 min. Fluorescence intensity was quantified by Incucyte S3 analysis software. Scale bar, 200 μm.
